a.title: Go to comments for Pearland ISD Online

div.p: The 2020 Census is mandated by the Constitution and conducted by the U.S. Census Bureau.
Online Textbooks and Resources for K-12 courses.

a.title: Go to comments for Online Textbooks

span.a: Pearland HS - Prom Postponed (future details will be sent out when available)
Pearland HS - Prom Postponed (future details will be sent out when available)

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

img.alt: (4/17/2020) Governor announces remote learning for duration of 2019-20 school year

a.span: (4/17/2020) Governor announces remote learning for duration of 2019-20 school year

div.p: Per Governor Abbott’s statewide order today, all schools in Texas will continue with a remote learning environment for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year due to the COVID-19 pandemic. As scheduled on our district calendar, the last day of school for Pearland ISD will be May 21.

a.title: Go to comments for (4/17/2020) Governor announces remote learning for duration of 2019-20 school year

a.span: Pearland ISD holds Virtual Job Fair

div.p: Don’t let social distancing stop you from being a part of Pearland ISD’s world-class team! During the Pearland ISD Virtual Job Fair being held April 20-24, candidates will have an opportunity to submit their job application along with a personal video introduction highlighting why they are the perfect fit for Pearland ISD’s team.

a.title: Go to comments for Pearland ISD holds Virtual Job Fair

img.alt: No District Activities on Good Friday, April 10

a.span: No District Activities on Good Friday, April 10

div.p: Pearland ISD will observe the district calendar for Good Friday, April 10 as a holiday for students and staff. We hope everyone takes a moment away from school to enjoy time with their family. Remote learning and regular curbside Grab & Go meal distribution will resume Monday, April 13.

a.title: Go to comments for No District Activities on Good Friday, April 10

a.span: “Anything Goes” earns eight Tommy Tune nominations

div.p: The classic Broadway musical “Anything Goes!” takes place aboard an ocean liner bound from New York to England and tells the story of love triangles, elaborate disguises, mistaken identities and marriage proposals. With music and lyrics by Cole Porter, Pearland High School’s spring production of the classic made the story triumphant.

a.title: Go to comments for “Anything Goes” earns eight Tommy Tune nominations

img.alt: (3/31/2020) Suspension of normal district operations until Monday, May 4

a.span: (3/31/2020) Suspension of normal district operations until Monday, May 4

div.p: After consulting with health officials, Governor Abbott’s announcement today, along with President Trump’s announcement to extend social distancing through April 30, Pearland ISD is joining other area school districts in extending the suspension of normal operations at least until Monday, May 4, to help prevent the spread of COVID-19.

a.title: Go to comments for (3/31/2020) Suspension of normal district operations until Monday, May 4
